Class TransformationsRegistry

java.lang.Object
  es.cv.gvcase.trmanager.registry.TransformationsRegistry

public class TransformationsRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

The TransformationsRegistry class, which manages resource transformations.

Constructor Detail

TransformationsRegistry

public TransformationsRegistry()
Method Detail

getTransformation

public static TransformationDesc getTransformation(java.lang.String transfIdentifier)
Gets a description of the transformation that is identified by transfIdentifier. If more than one of the registered transformations implements the same kind of transformation, the one with higher priority is returned.

Parameters:
transfIdentifier - the identifier of the kind of transformation.
Returns:
a TransformationDesc describing the transformation.

getTransformationsByTransfId

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<TransformationDesc>> getTransformationsByTransfId()
Gets the description of the transformations indexed by their identifiers. Since more than one transformation could provide the same kind of transformation, a list of transformations is returned for every transformation identifier.

Returns:
a HashMap with TransformationDesc} indexed by their identifiers.

getConfigurableTransformations

public static java.util.List<TransformationDesc> getConfigurableTransformations()
Gets a List with the description of the transformation that can be configured.

Returns:
a List with TransformationDesc}

getTransformationsByFileExtension

public static java.util.List<TransformationDesc> getTransformationsByFileExtension(java.lang.String fileExtension)
Gets a List with the description of the transformation that can be applied to a file extension.

Returns:
a List with TransformationDesc} that can be applied to the file extension

getAllTransformations

public static java.util.List<TransformationDesc> getAllTransformations()
Gets a List with all the description of the registered transformations.

Returns:
a List with TransformationDesc}

getTransformationsByPackage

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<TransformationDesc>> getTransformationsByPackage()
Gets the description of the transformations indexed by their package. Since more than one transformation could be attached to the same package, a list of transformations is returned for every transformation package.

Returns:
a HashMap with the TransformationDesc indexed by their packages.

getTransformationById

public static TransformationDesc getTransformationById(java.lang.String transformationId)
Gets the transformation description by its unique identifier.

Parameters:
transformationId - the transformation unique identifier
Returns:
the TransformationDesc with the unique identifier

executeTransformation

public static boolean executeTransformation(java.lang.String transformationId,
                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> inputParams,
                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> outputParams,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> messagesList)
Executes the kind of transformation that is identified by transformationId. It implements the steps of the execution strategy.

Parameters:
transformationId - the identifier of the kind of transformation to be executed.
inputParams - the resources that are received as input to the transformation.
outputParams - the resources that are produced as output by the transformation.
messagesList - a list of messages that inform about events that happened while executing the transformation.
Returns:
true, if successful

runTransformation

public static boolean runTransformation(java.lang.String transformationId,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> inputParams,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> outputParams,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> messagesList)
Runs the transformation that is identified by transformationId. It invokes the actual transformation object.

Parameters:
transformationId - the identifier of the kind of transformation be run
inputParams - the resources that are received as input to the transformation.
outputParams - the resources that are produced as output by the transformation.
messagesList - a list of messages that inform about events that happened while running the transformation.
Returns:
true, if successful

runTransformation

public static boolean runTransformation(java.lang.String transformationId,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> inputParams,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> outputParams,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> messagesList,
                                        TransformedResource configuration)
Runs the configuration transformation that is identified by transformationId. It invokes the actual transformation object.

Parameters:
transformationId - the identifier of the kind of transformation be run
inputParams - the resources that are received as input to the transformation.
outputParams - the resources that are produced as output by the transformation.
messagesList - a list of messages that inform about events that happened while running the transformation.
Returns:
true, if successful

generateConfiguration

public static boolean generateConfiguration(java.lang.String transformationId,
                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> inputParams,
                                            java.lang.String configModel,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> messagesList)
Generates an initial configuration for the input parameters.

Parameters:
transformationId - the identifier of the kind of transformation
inputParams - the resources that are received as input to the transformation.
configModel - the path where the configuration model must be created.
messagesList - a list of messages that inform about events that happened while initializing the configuration.
Returns:
true, if successful

validateInputParams

public static boolean validateInputParams(java.lang.String transformationId,
                                          java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,TransformedResource> inputs,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> errorList)
Executes the actions to validate the parameters that are received as input to the transformation.

Parameters:
transformationId - the transformation id
inputs - the resources that are received as input to the transformation.
errorList - a list of messages that inform about problems with the input parameters.
Returns:
true, if successful
